name: Waku Waku Ultraman Racing
overview:
Waku Waku Ultraman Racing (わくわくウルトラマンレーシング in Japanese) is a Kiddie Ride and Arcade Game that was made by Sega in 1996 in Japan only, and the 8th in the Waku Waku line of Kiddie Rides from Sega. It is based on the Ultraman Series by Tsuburaya Productions, and runs on Sega System 16B Arcade Hardware.


Riders sit on Ultraman, and control Ultraman or Ultraseven as they race against several Kaijus and Alien Baltan. At some point during the race, the riders will have to fight Baltan to win the race. The ride ends when the riders reach the goal.
